section.name: What is Toolforge?
section.p: Toolforge is the Sourceforge project name for a suite of tools related to release and configuration management. The suite is also known as Karma which is derived from Code And Release Management Application, but 'CARMA' wasn't good enough a name for us.

Using a version control system to manage source code repositories and build tools like Ant and Maven alone is not enough for software development centers where component management and reuse of software is an hot issue.

subsection.name: Open source and free
subsection.p: Toolforge hosts all freely available tools for the Karma suite.
You can find released versions of Karma Core and Karma CLI here.
